text: Mark off the width, height and main proportions of Sasuke’s figure. Draw his head and a centre line.
Outline the torso, neck, sword, and sheath.
Add guidelines for his arms, legs, and the proportions of Sasuke’s face.
Draw the shapes of his arms, clothes, and eyes.
Draw in detail his fingers, eye pupils, legs, the general shape of his hair, sword, belt, the waist of the pants, and his braces.
Sketch his toes, the shapes of his clothes, and hair locks. Refine the shape of the sword.
Add his toenails and nose. Detail the shape of his hair and belt. Work on the whole figure, paying special attention to the details.
Contour Sasuke, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Draw the details more carefully, and add the ground. Erase all the guidelines.
